scripts.build:all: bun run build:macos && bun run build:windows
scripts.build:macos: bun run build:prepare && bun tauri build --bundles dmg && bun run build:organize
scripts.build:windows: bun run build:prepare && bun tauri build --runner cargo-xwin --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc && bun run build:organize
scripts.build:organize: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const exists=dir=>fs.existsSync(dir); const copyDir=(src,dest)=>{if(exists(src)&&!exists(dest))fs.cpSync(src,dest,{recursive:true});}; copyDir('src-tauri/target/release/bundle/dmg','builds/macos/dmg'); copyDir('src-tauri/target/release/bundle/macos','builds/macos/app'); copyDir('src-tauri/target/release/bundle/msi','builds/windows-msi'); copyDir('src-tauri/target/x86_64-pc-windows-msvc/release/bundle/nsis','builds/windows-nsis'); copyDir('src-tauri/target/x86_64-pc-windows-msvc/release/bundle/msi','builds/windows-msi'); copyDir('src-tauri/target/release/bundle/deb','builds/linux-deb'); copyDir('src-tauri/target/release/bundle/appimage','builds/linux-appimage');"
